messages.message:
Hi @jack.robbins, do we have an official product requirement document for task-based human review? So far I have
1. Figma screens of task-based review in https://www.figma.com/design/UE91esgJlmFXpvAH62vRTh/Case-Management?node-id=1104-206735&t=KCMNeUF4ApEWdMP9-0
2. State of Human Review deck https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1Lu-KpsQOZYAg3cIKcz9KNKHQRNDRXG49VueZltvoLQo/edit
Are there any other docs / resources I should look at? Maybe a recording of a spec review meeting if it was done before I joined?

Hey Prateek - it wasn't separated out from the full Case management PRD, which is fairly old at this point (see the last 2 sections in the Requirements table): https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RQTlkFH0-AkAQM1yKD91uwZ1jFmSfblaiE93-Y3UaIs/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.hhzjt9td404h

The most up to date artifact to work from is the Figma screens, but I'm happy to supplement if needed.

I can't find anything in my zoom recordings list but wouldn't be surprised if there was something there. But in any case I'm happy to walk through the screens and further document the requirements again to help answer questions for the tech design.
Gotcha, thanks! Will let you know as questions come up
